SEARCH
Package com.example.espresso.Event

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.espresso.Event.Event
public class Event extends Object
This event model class holds essential information about a given event referenced with primary key eventID(id). This class is used to store, collect, or display events through the Firebase DB onto different fragments or activities viewed by Attendees, Organizers, and Admins.

    static interface 
    Event.OnUrlFetchedListener
    Interface for listening to the URL fetch result from Firebase Storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(String name, String date, String time, String description, String deadline, int capacity, Facility facility, int drawn, String status, boolean geolocation, int sample)
      Creates a new event with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the event
      date - The date of the event
      time - The time of the event
      description - A description of the event
      deadline - The deadline for event registration
      capacity - The maximum capacity of the event
      facility - The facility where the event takes place
      drawn - The number of participants drawn for the event
      status - The current status of the event
      geolocation - Indicates whether geolocation is enabled for the event
      sample - A sample parameter (purpose is unclear in the provided code)

      Hashes the provided text using SHA-256.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to hash
      Returns:
      The hashed text as a hex string
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If SHA-256 algorithm is not found
